Utilities

Class Examination

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utilities.Examination
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Examination
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class to hold all informations about an examination.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • recycleLastIDs

        public void recycleLastIDs()
        Reduce LastProbID and LastUserID as minimum as possible. It will replace all question id sequentially and store minimum possible value in LastProbID. It will replace all candidate id sequentially and store minimum possible value in LastUserID.
